name: Monkey Dice
description:
Monkey See Dice. Monkey Roll Dice.

Successful monkeys know 8 things.

1. Watch the faces of the current dice to know what you're rolling.

2. Add the current dice to the board by clicking ROLL. Be careful, consecutive rolls of the same dice cost extra.

3. Replace the current dice by clicking SWEEP, which only costs 2.

4. Gain bananas by landing dice on banana faces.  

5. Gain extra bananas by clicking on connected colors. This will absorb the color and also reroll the dice.

6. Monkeys start to die when they have less than 2 bananas. 

7. Click the arrows to select lines. You can then reroll them (costs 5) or remove them for free.

8. Roll a full line of matching glyphs (color doesn't matter) to complete the objectives.      Submit them the same way you remove lines. Submissions gives 10 bananas.

This game was written under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The source code can be found on my GitHub! No game engine was used. This was made from scratch using pretty much only JavaScript. It was designed to be playable on mobile, but I've heard that it's not currently working on iPhones (but seems to work fine on Android devices and iPads). Thanks for playing!
